item.title: CADO: An Online Daycare Platform Designed for Kids
item.description: Story Working from home as a mother can feel like paradise. But, you have back-to-back meetings, an upcoming product release, and presentations to upper management with your children crying and running around. How do you concentrate? CADO aims to provide an online daycare to keep your children busy and distracted on our cloud meeting platform designed for kids. You won’t need to worry about balancing work and your children’s education because through interactive activities, we teach them life skills, language courses, and simple math - you choose it!
